ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool! Thanks! One more thing, do I need any items to self port? I heard someone saying they needed a key or something to port. luv, -Su ... forest. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! Thanks!
One more thing, do I need any items to self port? I heard someone saying
they needed a "key" or something to port.
luv,
-Su

> No they do not. However there are quite a few roaming NPC's in Tox
forest.
> Some are still blue to 56 (one is an Enchanter). So after you get there I
> would invis myself.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 5:43 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
>
>
> Do the wiz spires/ring in Tox have Erudite guards? Bc, I'm a DE and KOS to
> erudites. I just got my tox gate spell and dont' want to go without
knowing
> if I'll be attacked immediately upon porting.
> Thanks.
> luv,
> -Su
